chunk.buffer:
ph : PH_START phattr* TEXT PH_END -> ^(PH_START phattr* TEXT) ;
phattr : PH_ATTR_ID | PH_ATTR_SCTYPE ;

ph : ^(PH_START (phattrs+=phattr)* TEXT) -> template( attributes = {$phattrs}, v = {$TEXT.text} ) <<\<ph <attributes; separator=" ">\><v>\</ph\> >> ;
phattr : PH_ATTR_SCTYPE -> template( v = {$PH_ATTR_SCTYPE.text} ) <<sctype="<v>">> | PH_ATTR_ID -> template( v = {$PH_ATTR_ID.text} ) <<id="<v>">> ;
